Package com.github.actionfx.core.utils

Class ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.utils.ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder
  • public class ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for creating a BooleanBinding for one or many Controls.

    This builder allows to create boolean bindings based on chained predicates of form: 

     boolean_value = NOT? (NOT? predicate1 [AND|OR] NOT? predicate2 [AND|OR] predicate3 ....)
    The predicates themselves again are evaluated against a list of controls, where you can chose, whether the predicate needs to be true for all controls or only for at least one control. (see allFulfilledFunction(Predicate) and atLeastOneFulfilledFunction(Predicate)).
    Author:
    koster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder​(boolean createPredicate)
      Internal constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder addNewPredicate​(BooleanOp booleanOp)
      Adds a new predicate to the predicate chain by linking it logically with the supplied booleanOp with the previous predicate in the chain.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder allFulfilledFunction​(java.util.function.Predicate<ControlWrapper> allFulfilledFunction)
      Defines a predicate that all controls need to fulfill, i.e. the function needs to evaluate to true for all controls.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder and()
      Adds another predicate together with controls and an observable extractor function to the chain, while the element is logically ANDed with previous predicates.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder atLeastOneFulfilledFunction​(java.util.function.Predicate<ControlWrapper> atLeastOneFulfilledFunction)
      Defines a predicate that at least one control needs to fulfill, i.e. the function needs to evaluate to true for at least one control.
      javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding build()
      Builds the actual BooleanBinding with the parameters specified in this ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder instance.
      static ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder create()
      Creates a new ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder.
      static ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder create​(boolean createPredicate)
      Creates a new ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder forControl​(javafx.scene.control.Control... controls)
      Adds one or multiple new Controls to this boolean binding builder.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder forControlWrapper​(ControlWrapper... wrappers)
      Adds a new array of ControlWrappers to this boolean binding builder.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder negate()
      Negates the current predicate under construction.This function is toggling negations, i.e. if you negate two times, the result is not negated anymore.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder negateAll()
      Negates the complete chain of predicates in this boolean binding builder.This function is toggling negations, i.e. if you negate two times, the result is not negated anymore.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder observableExtractorFunction​(java.util.function.Function<ControlWrapper,​javafx.beans.Observable> observableExtractorFunction)
      Defines a function for extracting the Observable from a Control.
      ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder or()
      Adds another predicate together with controls and an observable extractor function to the chain, while the element is logically ORed with previous predicates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder

        protected ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder​(boolean createPredicate)
        Internal constructor. Use create() for constructing an instance.
        Parameters:
        createPredicate - flag that determines, whether a first predicate for building shall be added. If that flag is set to false, a call to addNewPredicate(BooleanOp) has to be performed before other builder methods are used.

      • addNewPredicate

        public ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder addNewPredicate​(BooleanOp booleanOp)
        Adds a new predicate to the predicate chain by linking it logically with the supplied booleanOp with the previous predicate in the chain.
        Parameters:
        booleanOp - the boolean operator to use for linking the new predicate in the chain
        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • negate

        public ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder negate()
        Negates the current predicate under construction.This function is toggling negations, i.e. if you negate two times, the result is not negated anymore.
        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • negateAll

        public ControlBasedBooleanBindingBuilder negateAll()
        Negates the complete chain of predicates in this boolean binding builder.This function is toggling negations, i.e. if you negate two times, the result is not negated anymore.

        The method behaves like: 

         boolen result = ! (predicate1 (AND|OR) predicate2 (AND|OR) predicate3 ... )
        Returns:
        this builder instance
